text:
地址：中環德輔道中71號永安集團大廈1401-03室
體檢當日，請攜帶：
1. 護照及香港身分證正本
2. ***免疫接種記錄***
3. 領使館轉介信（如適用）
4. 2019冠狀病毒病疫苗接種證明（如適用）
5. 配戴適合眼鏡（如適用）
6. 服用長期藥物名稱及用量（藥袋也可）（如適用）
7. 醫療報告（手術報告、病理化驗報告等）（如適用）
8. 舊胸肺片及（或）胸肺科醫療報告（如適用）
注意：
trans:
Address: Room 1401-03, Wing On Group Building, 71 Des Voeux Road Central, Central
On the day of the medical examination, please bring:
1. Original passport and Hong Kong ID card
2. ***Immunization records***
3. Embassy referral letter (if applicable)
4. COVID-19 vaccination certificate (if applicable)
5. Wear appropriate glasses (if applicable)
6. Name and dosage of long-term medications (medication bags are also acceptable) (if applicable)
7. Medical reports (surgical reports, pathology reports, etc.) (if applicable)
8. Previous chest and lung X-rays and/or respiratory medical reports (if applicable)
Note:
